author: Ildefonso Ortiz
title: Mexican Coronavirus Cases Climb 12 Percent in One Day
description: Mexican health officials saw a 12 percent jump in one day for the number of Coronavirus (COVID-19) cases. The national total now stands at 2,785 confirmed.
content:
Mexican health officials saw a 12 percent jump in one day for the number of Coronavirus (COVID-19) cases. The national total now stands at 2,785 confirmed.
Health officials released the new figures during a nightly news conference where they revealed that in… [+1435 chars]
